summary: Dragons are enabled at start, including at the word walls.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Content:[/b][/size][/color]

 - dragons are enabled at start, including at the word walls.
 - dialogue topics that mention the player being dragonborn and absorbing the "very soul" of the dragon have been delayed so that they do not happen before the player has completed Dragon Rising,
 - this mod doesn't modify any vanilla quest, script or cells whether interior or exterior.

[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Note:[/b][/size][/color]

Things being modified by script, the new settings will be stored into your saves, forever.

[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Installation and removal:[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*]Download the archive and extract its content into your Data directory (Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data); do not extract the content of the .bsa file.
[*]Deinstalling this mod is not safe at all.
[/list]

[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]This mod is available here only.
[/b][/size][/color]
Enjoy!
author: anneschmidt
